head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARRON, MICHAEL S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARRON, MICHAEL S.

block.p: BARRON-Michael S. On July 5, 2000. Beloved husband of Susan. Dear father of Elizabeth, Dana, Pamela and father-in-law of Robert, Thomas and Adam. Adored grandfather of Rebecca, Campbell, Anna, Sophie and Phoebe. Adored son of Jean Sack. Dear brother of Toby Green and Peter Barron. Services Friday, July 7, 11:15AM at ''The Riverside'', 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave.

BARRON-Michael S. On July 5, 2000. Beloved husband of Susan. Dear father of Elizabeth, Dana, Pamela and father-in-law of Robert, Thomas and Adam. Adored grandfather of Rebecca, Campbell, Anna, Sophie and Phoebe. Adored son of Jean Sack. Dear brother of Toby Green and Peter Barron. Services Friday, July 7, 11:15AM at ''The Riverside'', 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave.
